about_the_game:
Hey there, fellow bunny lovers!

Are you ready to hop into some seriously fun gameplay? Bouncy Bunnies is the perfect game for a friendly race against your friends. In a colorful platform world, your goal is to be the first bunny to reach the finish line. You can take a boost to run faster, or try to find the shortest path to the goal. With 8 different levels to choose from, there's always something new to explore.

But don't forget to collect those carrots along the way! They'll help you get a higher score and come out on top. And with keyboard and mouse support, as well as gamepad support, you can play however you like. But for the ultimate bunny-bouncing experience, we recommend using a controller.

And don't forget - you can even host your own server and invite your friends to join in on the fun. So gather your bunny buddies and let the race begin!

Features:

1-4 players
4 different bunnies to choose from
8 levels for multiplayer fun
1 level for single player action
Carrot and power boost pickups to help you along the way
Keyboard and mouse support, as well as gamepad support for even more options

name: Bouncy Bunnies
short_description: Race against your friends in a colorful platform world filled with colors and fun obstacles. Take boost to run faster or try to find the most efficient path to be the first little bunny to reach the goal. Choose from 8 levels. Collect those tasty carrots to rack up a high score and come out top!
